attributes.action: Introduce fines or penalty points to drivers for driving too slow on national speed limit roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce a penalty system for drivers who drive over 20mph under the limit on national speed limit roads.  Aggression on all UK roads is caused by other drivers that are unable to maintain the national speed limit on the given roads.  This causes other drives to become enraged due to their extended journey times and their behavior subsequently floods onto our residential roads.  A fine/penalty system for slow drivers should be introduced similar to the existing speeding penalty system.
